results.name: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher (win32)
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or Higher
  • Graphics: 250 MB or higher
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher (win32)
  • Processor: Pentium 4 or Higher
  • Graphics: 250 MB or higher
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7-10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100T | AMD FX-6100
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 | AMD Radeon R7-250X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina 10.15 or later
  • Processor: Mac 1.8 Ghz or faster processor (Apple Siilicon and Intel)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 550 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor or faster processor
  • Memory: 1 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 550 MB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-9600 / AMD Ryzen 3600x
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC. Oculus Touch, Oculus Touch 2 or Valve Index controllers
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7-10700k / AMD Ryzen 5800x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3080
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Amd Athlon X4 840 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 & Shader Model 5.0 support required
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-2105 / AMD® FX 4300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 460 (1GB) / AMD® Radeon™ HD 7870 (2GB) / Intel® Iris Pro™ 580 / Intel® Iris® Plus G7 / AMD® Radeon™ Vega 11
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K / AMD® Ryzen™ 5 2400G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 1650 (4GB) / AMD® Radeon™ R9 390X (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Additional Notes: 1920*1080 resolution recommended

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS *: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: Dual Core 2 GHz
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630 / 640M or AMD Radeon HD 7450
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04+, SteamOS
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB NVidia or ATI graphics card, Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 590, or equivalent

  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-4770K, AMD Ryzen 5 1500X, or better
